This is a sample plain text file for testing the local-rag project indexer.

It contains multiple paragraphs to verify that text extraction and chunking
work correctly for plain text files.

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This sentence contains every
letter of the English alphabet and is commonly used for testing purposes.

Local RAG systems provide privacy-preserving search over personal documents.
By keeping all processing local, sensitive information never leaves the machine.
